title.narrative: National Motorway M-4 Gojra-Shorkot-Khanewal Section Project - Additional Financing

description.narrative: The additional financing will support an increase in the scope of the current project by constructing a 64-kilometer (km) four-lane, access-controlled motorway connecting Shorkot and Khanewal in Punjab Province, which is the last missing section of the national motorway M-4 to be constructed. The project will facilitate north-south connectivity, improve quality and efficiency of road transport services, and promote inclusive economic growth.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
Contract management and execution carried out effectively without undue delay and unresolved disputes
